docs.title: What you’ll find here
docs.text: • A testing Play for documentation as code within GitHub

docs.title: Local preview
docs.text:
1. Install Python 3.x
  2. Install dependencies: pip install -r requirements.txt
  3. Run: mkdocs serve
  4. Open: http://127.0.0.1:8000

docs.title: Sample diagram in Mermaid
docs.text:
flowchart LR
    A[Author writes Markdown] --> B[GitHub Repository]
    B --> C[GitHub Actions CI]
    C --> D[MkDocs Build]
    D --> E[gh-pages branch]
    E --> F[GitHub Pages Site]
